events.message: The car accident claim was filed after the collision on Main Street involving a rear-end impact.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the collision involving the insured vehicle.
An agent was assigned to handle the accident claim and contact the claimant for further details.
The claim was officially acknowledged, and the claimant was informed about the next steps in the process.
The claimant was requested to submit police reports, photos of vehicle damage, and a repair estimate.
Claimant submitted all required documents including collision photos, police report, and insurance details.
Investigation began to verify the details of the vehicle accident and assess liability and damage extent.
The investigation was completed confirming the claimant was not at fault for the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover vehicle repairs and related expenses due to the accident.
The customer provided positive feedback appreciating the prompt settlement offer after the accident.
The claim was approved after acceptance of the settlement proposal by the customer.
The payment for vehicle repairs was issued promptly following claim approval and customer confirmation.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after all payments were completed and customer satisfied.
